name: To the Stars
description:
【Title】　To the stars
【Genre】　Wholesome
【No. of Endings】　1
【Playthrough time】　1hour 30 min.
【Development time】　Approx. 6 mo.
【Live streaming, Re-creation】Not restricted
【Download】　Click here to download

“To the stars”───── I’ve drafted the outline of the story quite some time and took some time to make it into a game. The playthrough time is about 90 minutes and no lines, just like how I designed from the beginning.
I somehow barely managed to control the development time with 6 months.

Author:
Fukinshin Brothers
RPG Maker Creator from Taiwan.
